definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Hedonism idol of culture aesthetics, Utilitarianism demand of life practice.
sentences.chinese: 生活实践的功利主义诉求。

sentences.english: The ex-servicemen's main grievance is the difficulty of settling back into civilian life.
sentences.chinese: 退伍军人的主要诉求是解决退伍安置的问题。

sentences.english: Recognition and redistribution are normative double-trends in contemporary social justice and its realization.
sentences.chinese: 承认和再分配是当代社会正义诉求的双向规范趋势。

sentences.english: It's embodying an expression of the spiritual.
sentences.chinese: 这体现了一种精神诉求。

sentences.english: They ran into a brick wall when the school board re-fused to hear their appeal.
sentences.chinese: 学校董事会拒绝他们的诉求时，他们又遇到一次挫折。

sentences.english: Mr Macrae said the appeal to voters' self-interest was sad.
sentences.chinese: 麦克雷先生说，选民自身利益诉求很伤心。

sentences.english: Set up the "sun mountain" network, open people's appeal channels.
sentences.chinese: 搭建了《阳光秀山》网络，畅通人民群众的诉求渠道。

sentences.english: What is the major application for the product in local?
sentences.chinese: 请问当地的主要产品是以那一类做为诉求？

sentences.english: The main demand is the execution of the federal law #131.
sentences.chinese: 他们最主要的诉求就是实施第131号联邦法规。

sentences.english: Many believe it's also the best time for their prayers to be heard.
sentences.chinese: 许多人相信这是自己的诉求上达天庭的最佳时候。

sentences.english: Therefore, reestablishing worship is the spiritual demand of contemporary Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 信仰重建是当代中国人精神世界的诉求。

sentences.english: Fashion and technology are becoming the common aspirations of the many underwear enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 时尚与科技正成为众多内衣企业的共同诉求。

sentences.english: In some ways, Cloud Gate is an ­appealing model.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，云门是一个诉求的模型。

sentences.english: This demand for speech aesthetics was proposed again after Liang Shiqiu.
sentences.chinese: 这是继梁实秋之后的审美话语诉求的再次被提出。

sentences.english: Now you are ready to do your Barrens quests and get to level 20 fast.
sentences.chinese: 现在，您准备做你的贫瘠之地诉求，并到达20级快。

sentences.english: The immortal advertisement originality tactics—Enlightment from P&G cleanse articles entering into Chinese market;
sentences.chinese: 情感诉求是现代广告创意的一种重要表现手段。

definition: to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
to appeal (to reason, sentiment, charity etc)/to resort to (a course of action)
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
